document_data.name: Wandering Heart
document_data.mainbody: '''Wandering hearts''' were a species of fragrant flowers grew in the tropical climate of the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Habitats: Noble gardens of [[Arrabar]] in the Vilhon Reach were filled with overpowering scents of flowering plants, including [[bougainvillea]]s, [[passion vine]]s, [[orchid]]s, and wandering hearts. Notably, the flowers could be found in the gardens surrounding mansions of [[House Matrell]] and [[House Pharaboldi]].
